uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.utils

Class SchemaUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.utils.SchemaUtils

  • public class SchemaUtils
extends Object
    This class is responsible for converting a Gaffer Schema to a Parquet MessageType per group and to a Spark schema (a StructType per group). It also provides a central place to get all the mappings from Gaffer Properties to columns, aggregator's to columns, serialiser's to columns, etc.

      • getColumnToPaths

        public Map<String,String[]> getColumnToPaths(String group)
        This method returns, for the provided group, an array of Strings giving the path to the column or columns associated to that group.
        Parameters:
        group - the group
        Returns:
        a map from column to full paths for the given group
